headline: Edison International Q4 Earnings Miss Estimates, Revenues Rise Y/Y
summary: EIX's fourth-quarter revenues beat the Zacks Consensus Estimate by 4.9%. The top line also increases 7.5% from the year-ago level.

raw.headline: Edison International Q4 Earnings Miss Estimates, Revenues Rise Y/Y
raw.summary: EIX's fourth-quarter revenues beat the Zacks Consensus Estimate by 4.9%. The top line also increases 7.5% from the year-ago level.

headline: Edison Rises After Executives Reassure Investors on Wildfires
summary: (Bloomberg) -- Edison International rose the most in more than a month after executives told investors that it thinks it acted prudently around the Los Angeles wildfires and that a state insurance fund would protect its finances.
